titles: A sermon vpon part of the prophesie of Obadiah touching the destruction, as of Idum√¶ans, so of Papists; and meanes whereby it must be wrought: preached at Saint Maries in Oxford by Iohn Rainoldes, on the 28. of October last. 1584.
author: Rainolds, John, 1549-1607.
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
